001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.DomainObject;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
007
008/**
009 * Defines a configurable trainer for {@link EstimationFunction}s.
010 *
011 * <p>
012 * A {@code Trainer} encapsulates the core components of a training
013 * pipeline: an {@link Initializer}, an {@link ObjectiveFunction},
014 * an {@link Optimizer}, and a {@link Regime}. By composing these
015 * elements, the trainer is able to initialize a model, compute loss
016 * and gradients, apply optimization steps, and control the overall
017 * training process.
018 * </p>
019 *
020 * <p>
021 * This interface exposes getters and setters for each component,
022 * allowing dynamic reconfiguration of the training strategy. It also
023 * defines a {@link #train(EstimationFunction, DataSet)} method as the
024 * entry point for executing the training process.
025 * </p>
026 *
027 * @param <E> the type of {@link EstimationFunction} being trained
028 * @see Initializer
029 * @see ObjectiveFunction
030 * @see Optimizer
031 * @see Regime
032 */
033@DomainObject
034@Strategy(Strategy.Role.INTERFACE)
035public interface Trainer<E extends EstimationFunction<Float>> {
036
037    /**
038     * Returns the initializer used to prepare the estimation function
039     * prior to training.
040     *
041     * @return the initializer
042     */
043    Initializer<? super E, Float> getInitializer();
044
045    /**
046     * Sets the initializer used to prepare the estimation function
047     * prior to training.
048     *
049     * @param initializer the initializer to set
050     */
051    void setInitializer(Initializer<? super E, Float> initializer);
052
053    /**
054     * Returns the objective function used to evaluate and guide training.
055     *
056     * @return the objective function
057     */
058    ObjectiveFunction getObjective();
059
060    /**
061     * Sets the objective function used to evaluate and guide training.
062     *
063     * @param objective the objective function to set
064     */
065    void setObjective(ObjectiveFunction objective);
066
067    /**
068     * Returns the optimizer used to update the parameters of the
069     * estimation function.
070     *
071     * @return the optimizer
072     */
073    Optimizer<? super E, Float> getOptimizer();
074
075    /**
076     * Sets the optimizer used to update the parameters of the
077     * estimation function.
078     *
079     * @param optimizer the optimizer to set
080     */
081    void setOptimizer(Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer);
082
083    /**
084     * Returns the regime that controls the overall training flow,
085     * such as batching and number of epochs.
086     *
087     * @return the training regime
088     */
089    Regime getRegime();
090
091    /**
092     * Sets the regime that controls the overall training flow,
093     * such as batching and number of epochs.
094     *
095     * @param regime the training regime to set
096     */
097    void setRegime(Regime regime);
098
099    /**
100     * Trains the given estimation function on the provided training set
101     * using the configured initializer, objective function, optimizer,
102     * and regime.
103     *
104     * @param estimationFunction the model or estimation function to train
105     * @param trainingSet        the dataset used for training
106     */
107    void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<Float> trainingSet);
108
109    /**
110     * Factory method for creating a new {@code Trainer} with the given
111     * components.
112     *
113     * <p>
114     * This method constructs a {@link TrainerImpl}, configures it with
115     * the provided initializer, objective, optimizer, and regime, and
116     * returns it as a {@link Trainer} instance.
117     * </p>
118     *
119     * @param <E>         the type of estimation function to train
120     * @param initializer the initializer to use
121     * @param objective   the objective function to use
122     * @param optimizer   the optimizer to use
123     * @param regime      the training regime to use
124     * @return a configured trainer instance
125     */
126    static <E extends EstimationFunction<Float>> Trainer<E> of(Initializer<? super E, Float> initializer, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E, Float> optimizer, Regime regime) {
127        TrainerImpl<E> trainer = new TrainerImpl<>();
128        trainer.setInitializer(initializer);
129        trainer.setObjective(objective);
130        trainer.setOptimizer(optimizer == null ? (e, s, o) -> {
131        } : optimizer);
132        trainer.setRegime(regime);
133        return trainer;
134    }
135}
